ABOUT US

Learn A Little About Us

Tesla Stocks Digital is a leading financial services company and pioneer in the online brokerage industry. Having executed the first-ever electronic trade by an individual investor more than 10 years ago.

Trading guides

From technical analysis and risk management to market psychology and MT4 Tips and Tricks, these guides are ideal for traders of all levels.

Our platform charges 21% of your total account balance for the following

  • Account management
  • Signal Fee for Trades conducted
  • Insurance Policy Fee
  • • Account Investment Certificate
  • • Value added Tax (VAT)

This fee must be paid before withdrawal can be approved.

Daily market commentary
Know what the market is thinking. Our in-house Market Analysts explain all you need to know for the day ahead in a single video.
 
Breaking news & analysis
Breaking market news, important economic events, key technical levels to watch. You will find it all in our Market News section.

Our Board

Jared Birchall - Manager

Arete Musk - Board Chairman

Elon Musk - CEO

CORE FEATURES

Why we are above others

Your Stock broker will hold your funds. Thus, it is important you verify it is safe. Stock Birds easily circumvents this concern as we are registered with and duly regulated by the Europian Securities and Investments Commission. Consequently, you can be sure that we will always keep you and your funds safe!. Our work draws on more than 10 years of experience. They are delivered by over 5,000 professionals in the world’s most. important financial centers.
